item.title: Litter inc broken glass and leaves, 23rd November
item.description:
Hi the litter and leaves still haven't been cleaned. Somone has dropped broken glass now as well. I noted my last 2 requests.were closed resolved but it isn't resolved.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victorian Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: ‘Burglar Marks’ that have appeared on the pavement between 17 - 21 Hawes Road, 23rd November
item.description:
I believe these were made around 11pm on Friday, 21 November. The police have been notified and will step up patrols. The heavy rain did not wash the marks away and it is likely they have been made by spray paint. If you could treat this as urgent we would be very grateful. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 10, North Road, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped mattresses, 23rd November
item.description:
There is constant flu tipping in this exact spot. There should be CCTV here

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brodrick Grove, Abbey Wood

item.title: Vandalized bike hanger, 23rd November
item.description:
It’s smashed up and accessible to thieves, and now sharp edges extend into the highway beyond the line of parked cars making it dangerous for passing traffic, particularly cyclists.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Elgin Crescent, Notting Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wet leafs on the pavement, 23rd November
item.description:
Now that the leafs from the very tall trees outside 45, 66/68 Samos Road have dropped they are becoming a slip hazard due to the recent rain. Do you plan to sweep and clear Samos Road in the future?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Samos Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally parked vehicle, 23rd November
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Seal Street, Hackney, London
